name: Sliding Puzzle Deluxe The Classic
description:
Sliding Puzzle Deluxe The Classic is a game where you have to slide pieces around to get them in the right spot. If you have all pieces in the right spot, you complete the level!

Sliding Puzzle Deluxe The Classic includes lots of images in five gameplay modes, easy, normal, hard, master, and pro.

Sliding games improve problem-solving skills and improve concentration. Move the tiles to reassemble the picture, by clicking the block you want to move. The complexity increases as you play along.

Playing a sliding Puzzle is a good workout for the brain and keeps the brain active and refreshed. Play daily for some time and you can keep the brain happy.

Sliding Puzzle help to improve memory, agility, hand-eye coordination, and patience.
